title: Building Polyglot Python applications using MetaCall Core
description:
This talk was presented at PyCon India 2021 Online.

PyCon India is the largest gathering of Pythonistas in India for the Python programming language. 
The 13th edition of PyCon India took place online from 17th Sept to 20th Sept 2021.

Talk Detail: https://in.pycon.org/cfp/2021/proposals/building-polyglot-python-applications-using-metacall-core~av2QX/

Click here to subscribe to the PyCon India channel: https://www.youtube.com/user/inpycon?sub_confirmation=1
